Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these articles people are buzzing over the federal budget which has prompted scammers to prey on Australians struggling to make ends meet. There's also been a crackdown on violent behavior in sports and the introduction of nuclear-powered submarines. Actor Vince Colosimo has appeared in court over unpaid fines and a teenage girl is missing. Meanwhile Charters Towers in North Queensland is hailed as the gateway to Australia's outback while at a Perth detention center inmates have engaged in a massive disturbance.
